nodes.bodyText: Yeah that's a good point, but in this scenario I was thinking to remain consistent with the original implementation. Also I'm not sure how far we want to backport this, but if we backport it past the version where --bootstrap-server is not available, then I think we would have to rewrite this function to account for that. Also since we are on our way to deprecate and remove ZK, this would be a good way to start pushing us towards doing that.
